page.title: 10CHURCH AND RELIGION PT2
page.content: For the young who live in the area, the Church is seen as functional_ in terms of baptisms,weddings & funerals_ and the clergy are still viewed with slight fear & suspicion, for until fairly recently they were seen as part of the ruling classes. Church attendance is fairly high among the elderly and the retired but low among the young and the indigenous population. "Chapel" not "Church" was customary for the working man in living memory, and with the decline in attendance at non_conformist churches, the Parish Church is seeking to re_discover its ancient role as a symbol of unity and cohesion in an increasingly diverse community.
